SELECT cons.id as id ,cons.CONSULTING_NUMBER as consultingNumber ,CONCAT(IFNULL(cust.FIRST_NAME,''),' ',IFNULL(cust.LAST_NAME,'')) as customerName ,CONCAT(IFNULL(U.FIRST_NAME,''),' ',IFNULL(U.LAST_NAME,'')) as ownerName ,cons.CHANNEL_CD as channelCd ,cb1.CODE_NAME as channelName ,cons.STATUS_CD as statusCd ,cb2.CODE_NAME as statusName ,cons.START_DATE as startDate ,cons.END_DATE as endDate ,cons.TITLE as title ,cons.note as note
FROM jlo_crm.tb_consulting cons LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_customer cust on cons.CUST_ID = cust.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_codebook cb1 ON cons.CHANNEL_CD = cb1.CODE_ID AND cb1.CODE_TYPE = 'CONSULTING_CHANNEL' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_codebook cb2 ON cons.STATUS_CD = cb2.CODE_ID AND cb2.CODE_TYPE = 'CONSULTING_STATUS' LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_user U ON cons.OWNER_ID = U.ID WHERE cons.id = #{id}
